role.argrole: thing arg0 competes to take a ride in

example.parse: (IP (NP-TMP (PP (P 在) (NP (PN 此))) (NP (NN 同时))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (NP-SBJ (DP (DT 全)) (NP-PN (NR 台湾))) (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VV 抢搭) (NP-OBJ (NN 房市) (NN 热潮)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 建商))) (VP (ADVP (AD 不断)) (VP (VV 推出) (NP-OBJ (NN 新案)))))
